textos_fuente.text: Contact Us - British-Italian Michelin-star Restaurant - Murano Menus Private Dining Gifting Journal Team Careers Contact Reservations Close Contact Finding us 20 Queen Street Mayfair London W1J 5PP +44 (0)20 7495 1127 enquiries@muranolondon.com For Private Hires & Private Events please contact: enquiries@muranolondon.com For Press please contact: info@gemmabellandcompany.com Opening Hours MONDAY – THURSDAY Lunch: 12:00pm – 2:30pm Dinner: 6:00pm – 10:00pm FRIDAY – SATURDAY Lunch: 12:00pm – 3:00pm Dinner: 6:30pm – 10:00pm Newsletter sign up → 20 Queen Street Mayfair, London W1J 5PP. +44 (0)20 7495 1127 nearest station: Green park Angela Hartnett → Cafe Murano → © 2025 Murano Legal → Design by Ignite → Back to top ↑ Reservations → Menus Private Dining Gifting Journal Team Careers Contact Reservations Reservations To make a reservation please book online or email us enquiries@muranolondon.com If a suitable reservation is not available online, please email the restaurant and we shall do our best to accommodate your request. Group Bookings For private events or groups of 9 or over please call us directly. For tables of 2 and above we require Credit or Debit card details to secure the booking. Please note that a fee might apply in the event of a no-show or a cancellation made less than 48 hours prior to the seating time. Italian Restaurant in Covent Garden - Angela Hartnett’s Cafe Murano Cafe Murano Logo Home Restaurants St James’s Covent Garden Bermondsey Marylebone Menus Private Dining News & Events Careers About us Shop Online Book a Table Covent Garden Restaurant 36 Tavistock Street London WC2E 7PB 020 7240 3654 coventgarden@cafemurano.co.uk Let us know how your visit was Opening Hours MON 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM TUE 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM WED 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM THU 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM FRI 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM SAT 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM SUN 12.00PM - 6.00PM Opening Hours MON 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM TUE 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM WED 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM THU 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM FRI 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM SAT 12.00PM - 3.00PM 5.00PM - 10.30PM SUN 12.00PM - 6.00PM About Menus Private Dining Visit Covent Garden Leather banquettes and a long marble dining bar for Angela Hartnett’s Italian dishes. Our Covent Garden restaurant, in the heart of London. Relaxed, welcoming, and intimate. Private dining experiences and theatre menu options to enjoy every day of the week. Menus A La Carte Lunch/Theatre Dessert Wine Select dining space First floor dining room Pastificio Private Dining Intimate first floor private dining room Dedicated bar Skylight roof Seating for 20-50 guests Summer menu 2024 Events Brochure Wine list Covent Garden features two unique private dining rooms. On the first floor a large dining room flooded with natural light  accommodates 20-50 guests and includes a dedicated bar, while next door to the restaurant a more intimate space for up to 14 guests within our pasta shop/Italian deli. Please email privatedining@cafemurano.co.uk to enquire now. Enquire Now Private Dining Pastificio Intimate space Housed within pasta shop / deli up to 22 guests Summer Menu 2024 Private Dining Brochure Wine List Covent Garden features two unique private dining rooms. On the first floor a large dining room flooded with natural light  accommodates 20-50 guests and includes a dedicated bar, while next door to the restaurant a more intimate space for up to 22 guests within our pasta shop/Italian deli. Please email privatedining@cafemurano.co.uk to enquire now. Enjoy a drink with your dinner ? this restaurant has a full bar to serve up a glass of wine, beer, or more. No need to splurge on a babysitter ? tots will be right at home chowing down at this restaurant. On warmer days, you can take advantage of Cafe Murano's al fresco patio seating. Seating is readily available at Cafe Murano for those with large parties. Stay connected at no cost thanks to Cafe Murano's wifi. For those who prefer to dress down for dinner, Cafe Murano's low-key style is the perfect match. Need to get out of the house? Order and pick up from this restaurant. At Cafe Murano, drivers can settle for safe parking in the lot next door. Cafe Murano makes bikers feel at ease with the multiple storage racks outside. Cafe Murano is serving up five-star food at a reasonable price. If you're looking to rack up your frequent flyer miles, feel free to pay by major credit card. Grupo Murano EN | ES Home Our company About Murano Strategy Our history Strategic Partners Insights Portfolio Sustainability Investors Contact Management In order to achieve its objectives, Grupo Murano’s operations leverages on a fully multidisciplinary team with
                  over 20 years of combined experience in the Mexican real estate sector, and also specializes in all matters related
                  to the structuring of business with operators, providing a first class awareness to pinpoint business opportunities
                  in Mexico. Elias Sacal Chairman Marcos Sacal CEO / Member of the Board Marco Vázquez Head of Projects Leonel Martínez Legal counselor Gerardo Corona VP, Investor Relations & Strategy / Member of the Board Antonio Álvarez Chief Asset Management Officer & Head of Hospitality Business × Elias Sacal Marcos Sacal Marco Vázquez Leonel Martínez Gerardo Corona Antonio Álvarez Mr. Sacal is the founding member of Bay View Grand and Chairman
                                    of the Board of Murano . He is a leader within Mexico’s tourism and lodging industry with over 20 years
                                    of experience developing, acquiring and financing real estate projects. Mr. Sacal developed the “Second Home Living”
                                    experience for international buyers interested in owning a vacation home in Mexico which was entirely financed with
                                    local investments. He has led the development of multiple residential real estate projects including BVG Cancun,
                                    Residencial BVG Ixtapa, Marina Ixtapa and Grand Venetian BVG, among others. Mr. Sacal has been a member of the Patronato del Museo Nacional de Antropología e Historia , the World Federation of Friends of Museums, and adviser
                                    to the Princess Grace Foundation (Monaco). Mr. Marcos Sacal is the Chief Executive Officer of Murano , overseeing the construction and sale of Residencial Marina BVG Ixtapa for
                                    over US$89 million, the sale of Residencial Villa Alejandra BVG for US$48 million and Grand Venetian BVG Vallarta for US$300 million.
                                    He has prior experience in developing technology and Software as a Service (SaaS) platforms for the operation and management of real
                                    estate assets. He holds a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration from Universidad Anáhuac , a certification in Corporate Finance
                                    from the Instituto Tecnológico Autónomo de México (ITAM), and a Finance diploma with a certification in Project Evaluation from Harvard University. Mr. Marco Vázquez has more than 17 years of experience in real estate development, serving as Project Manager for Sanz Arquitectos Asociados since 2005. Before joining Murano, he also worked as Project Manager at Bay View Grand where he led several developments such as Villa Alejandra in Acapulco Guerrero, Grand Ventean in Puerto Vallarta, and Residencial Gran Dorado, in the State of Mexico, among others. Mr. Martínez has a Master’s Degree in Law and broad expertise in contracts, agreements and national and international bids for the development of important projects valued for over US$870 million, highlighting: The Emisor Oriente Tunnel, the Grand Island Hotel, the Samalayuca-Sasabe Gas Pipeline, the Landing Track 03 and Main Terminal of the New International Airport of Mexico City and the New School of Judges in Mexico City. He currently performs as legal counselor of the Murano Group, for projects such as the Wyndham Hotel in Mexico City and Grand Island Cancun Hotel. Mr. Corona has 26 years of experience in strategic business units, financial products, capital goods imports, risk analysis, portfolio recovery and financial structure to foreign trade productive projects at Mexico’s Development Banking. Former Mexico’s Undersecretary of Innovation and Touristic Development. Founder and CEO of GC Intelligi S.C., consulting firm conducting analysis, investigation and consultancy services to hotel projects and of infrastructure in Mexico. Among other positions, Mr. Gerardo Corona was CEO of International and Institutional Relations and Director of Financing for the Tourism Sector at Bancomext. Antonio Álvarez brings 30 years’ luxury hospitality leadership experience to his role, including serving in top positions at
                                  some of the world’s finest and most celebrated luxury hotels. A specialist in operations, protocols, and logistics – Mr. Álvarez is the epitome of a dynamic international hotelier. His exceptional leadership skills and ability to perform in different
                                  cultural contexts have made him a valued asset to major Hotel groups & Hospitality development companies around the world. Mr. Álvarez has developed a strong commitment to building and sustaining cohesive, top-performing teams. His background
                                  includes over 20 years of leadership within different luxury hotel companies portfolio, and has significantly contributed
                                  to service excellence at Hilton, Ritz-Carlton and Hyatt Hotels based in Western Europe, USA, and Asia Pacific. Result-oriented strategic leader who promotes a culture of excellence and offers a strong track record of performance
                                  in both Hotel and Corporate business units. Mr. Álvarez has proven abilities in meeting all objectives within company targets and retail / Hospitality operations. Experienced Top Senior Executive and skilled Managing Director & General Manager with
                                  expertise in hotel management, food and beverage operations, profit and loss management, and guest services operations. Proven areas of expertise also include: Strategic Planning & Organizational leadership, Budgeting & Cost Management,
                                  Revenue Management & New Business Development, Process Design & Productivity Improvement, Growth & Expansion Strategies,
                                  Profitability & Cost Analysis, Team Building & Performance Improvement, Contract Negotiations & Strategic Alliances. Murano is a real estate company with extensive experience in the design, structure and delivery of large scale hospitality and commercial projects across Mexico QUICK LINKS About Murano Portfolio Strategic Partners ESG Corporate Headquarters: 25 Berkeley Square London W1J 6HN United Kingdom Mexico City Office: AV. Ffcc de Cuernavaca No. 20, 12 Floor Lomas de Chapultepec, Sección III Miguel Hidalgo,  11000, Mexico City IR contact: +44 207 1676440 investors@murano.com.mx Keep in touch: MURANO © All rights reserved 2021 | Designed and generated by

Italian Restaurant St James's - Angela Hartnett's Cafe Murano Cafe Murano Logo Home Restaurants St James’s Covent Garden Bermondsey Marylebone Menus Private Dining News & Events Careers About us Shop Online Book a Table St James's Restaurant 33 St. James's Street London SW1A 1HD 020 3371 5559 reception@cafemurano.co.uk Let us know how your visit was Opening Hours MON 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM TUE 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM WED 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM THU 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM FRI 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM SAT 12.00 - 10.30PM SUN 12.00 - 4.30PM Opening Hours MON 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM TUE 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM WED 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM THU 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM FRI 12.00 - 3.00PM, 5.00 - 10.30PM SAT 12.00 - 10.30PM SUN 12.00 - 4.30PM About Menus Theatre Dining Private Dining Visit St James Join us at Cafe Murano St James's to enjoy Angela Hartnett’s uplifting Italian dishes. Our restaurant near Green Park and Piccadilly Circus, with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Relax, unwind, and enjoy the rich flavours of Italy's many diverse regions. Please note that due to building limitations, our restrooms are located on the lower ground floor and are not wheelchair accessible. Menus A La Carte Lunch/Theatre Dessert Wine Theatre Dining Complete your evening with a pre theatre dinner near Piccadilly, just a short walk from many of the West End Theatres. Please feel free to join us pre or post your performance, and experience the flavours of Italy. We open for pre theatre dinner from 5.30pm and serve our post theatre menu from 10.00pm. View Menu Private Dining Intimate semi-private dining room. Mood lighting Banquette seating for up to 22 guests Book your next event at one of the best Italian restaurants in London. Please email privatedining@cafemurano.co.uk to enquire now. Enquire Now Menu Please note due to building limitations, Cafe Murano St. James does not have an accessible restroom. contact us – Cafe Murano Cafe Murano Menu Home Location Gift Cards Our Menus Catering & Events Employment Make a Reservation Home Location Gift Cards Our Menus Catering & Events Employment Make a Reservation Send Us A Note Cafe Murano 309 Cranes Roost Blvd Altamonte Springs, FL (407) 834-5880 info@cafemurano.com Live Music Is Friday, Saturday & Sunday. Happy Hour: Mon – Fri 4-7 Saturday: 11-5 About Us Our food is carefully created using the freshest ingredients made from scratch. There are two cardinal rules of Italian cuisine – eat locally and eat seasonally. Food is part of the rhythm of life, and so Italians eagerly await the arrival of seasonal ingredients . We at Café Murano bring these themes from Italy to you.
